channel.title: Helmet Problem
channel.description:
Having a bit of trouble with the Torva helm after packing 667 items, added the new readvalues, added the new item.cfg, added it to item.java server sided as full helm, replaced everything else. But this happens? Anyone know why?
You can see the players head through the model :/
[img]http://i.imgur.com/ZsbFwby.png[/img]

item.title: Helmet Problem
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“Damoiscool, post:3, topic:551474”]Fixed*

Had to re do the methods[/quote]
Glad you gave out the fix for other users that may have the same problem [size=1pt]/sarcasm[/size]

Read full topic

item.title: Helmet Problem
item.dc:creator: @Damoiscool Damoiscool
item.description:
@Damoiscool wrote:

Fixed*

Had to re do the methods

Read full topic

item.title: Helmet Problem
item.dc:creator: @Welliton_inc Welliton_inc
item.description:
@Welliton_inc wrote:

Well, for a Delta/Czar, you have to add the helmet to the fullhelm, and hat location. Not just full helm alone. It is the same with H’ween masks, except instead of fullhelm they need to be added in the fullmask slot.

Read full topic
